collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_description: Consists of miscellaneous scripts including over 143 titles. The bulk of the collection dates from the l940s through the 1950s and includes series titles such as Burns and Allen, Duffy's Tavern, Jimmy Durante Show, Errand of Mercy, The Fred Allen Show, The Henry Morgan Show, Hollywood Star Preview, Mutual Radio Theater, Sears Radio Theater and others.
